ygData.subject: Re: Getting Cash  *SPOILER*
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Dervish ... I am level 10 and went there to try to solo one of the Aqua goblins.  He resisted my root and swam over and started beating me.  I was able to
ygData.messageBody:
> Could the OOT be a good place for a L14 wizard to solo some Aqua Goblins?
> Or are they too EZ for me????
>
> Thanks!
>
> -Mata

>
> By 14th, they are too easy. I would suggest Unrest or the Cutthroat
Dervish
> in West Commons.
>
> Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elven Wizard
>


I am level 10 and went there to try to solo one of the Aqua goblins. He
resisted my root and swam over and started beating me. I was able to land
some shocks of ice on him, but I could see he was going to kill me, so I
shadowstepped to the bottom of the ocean and gated to Felwithe from there.

Was this just unlucky, or do I need to wait a level before going back to the
Aquas? He did con blue to me.


--JW
